<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Bastards are

            </choice></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">which moves under the flowers and suddenly glares at us.</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Bastards are born in the flesh. Reputations are ruined.</l>
